no

it's either volume 10 of the manga or season 2 of the anime

and i REALLY want it to be the latter but the former is much more likely

i honestly just want it to be ANYTHING at this point

"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557627c86368720fb4000025#post_557627c86368720fb4000025

they did mention back in March that the volume 10 would be released "this summer," but they've been telling us that it would be released "soon" for almost 2 years now

at least now with a concrete announcement being held before us, it's bound to be something good

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55762cf463687221e80005f3#post_55762cf463687221e80005f3
"My Ordinary Life" is the English name given to Nichijou by Crunchyroll when they were simulcasting it.

Nichijou also literally translates into "Everyday" in English, so you'll often see those two names referring to the series
